document.masterDocTitle: Coralliophilinae (Neogastropoda: Muricidae) from the southwest Pacific

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Coralliophilinae (Neogastropoda: Muricidae) from the southwest Pacific
Mémoires du Muséum national d'Histoire naturelle

subSubSection.paragraph:
TYPE MATERIAL. —
Fusus abnormis
: holotype BMNH 1878.6 .10.17, figured By Kosuge & Suzuki (1985, pl. 39, fig. 1) and
Higo et al . (2001: 66
, fig. G2403)
. —
Latiaxis chiangi
: holotype , National Museum of Natural History , Tai Chung MT8218 [not seen]
. —
Coralliophila armeniaca
: holotype SDSHN 79507 [not seen], and 14 paratypes SDSHN 79504a-j [not seen], AMNH 213803 a-b, USNM 819634 a-b
.

TYPE LOCALITY. —
F. abnormis : Andaman Islands
, off Port Blair
. —
L. chiangi
: Bohol Island , Philippines
. —
C. armeniaca
: Bohol Straits , in
75 m
.

, 11 dd; stn 1009, Secteur de Plateau des Chesterfield , 19°37’S , 158°16’E ,

. LAGON: stn 38,
Secteur de Nouméa

.

169, Baie de St Vincent, 22°08’S , 168°08’E , 22 m , 1 dd; stn
Loyalty Islands
. Lifou. LIFOU 2000: stn DW 1650, 20°54.15’S , 202, 21°59’S , 165°57’E , 13 m , 2 dd; stn 302, Grand Récif Sud, 167°01.7’E , 120-150 m , 1 dd.

DISTRIBUTION. —
Indian Ocean : Somalia ( Kosuge 1993 ) to the Andaman Islands (Smith 1878). Pacific Ocean : from Kii Peninsula to the Philippines (Tsuchiya 2000). Coral Sea and New Caledonia , live in
15-25 m
, empty shells down to
68 m
.
Loyalty Ridge, Loyalty Islands and Vanuatu , empty shells in
120-260 m
.

REMARKS. —
Coralliophila abnormis
is commonly found throughout its range in water shallower than about
100 m .
The deeper records of empty shells from Loyalty Ridge and Vanuatu are likely to be a result of drift from shallower water. The protoconch of
Coralliophila armeniaca
, as described by D’Attilio & Myers (1984: 89 , fig. 23), is multispiral (3.5 whorls) with 2 poorly nodulose spiral cords crossed by axial ridges.
